name: [string].toLowerCase()
content: Sometimes in a text processing app you need to convert all the letters in a message to be the same case, all lower or all upper case. This can make it easier to match keywords your app is looking for to text input by the user, without having to worry about what case the letters are.

examples.name: Example: a string and a variable
Example: colors of fruits
examples.description: Demonstrate matching keywords to user input regardless of case.

palette_params.name: string
palette_params.description: The string to copy and convert to all lower case.

return_value: A copy of the string converted to all lower case.
short_description: Returns a new string that is the original *string* converted to all lower case letters.
tips: - [toUpperCase()](/docs/applab/toUpperCase) copies and converts a string to all upper case.
